wikipedia_page.main: Mike Towell (12 September 1991 – 30 September 2016) was a Scottish professional boxer from Dundee, Scotland.

response: **30 October - Scottish boxer Mike Towell dies following his fight with Carmarthen-based boxer Dale Evans.
*Mike Towell, 25, Scottish professional boxer, injuries sustained in a bout.Boxer Towell dies after Glasgow bout

link_mentions.page: 2016 BBC Sports Personality of the Year Award
List of deaths due to injuries sustained in boxing
response: |29 Sep 2016||Mike Towell||||Dale Evans|||| 25-year-old Towell was knocked down in the 1st round and again in the 5th prior to the stoppage, he was carried from the ring on a stretcher and taken to hospital. He passed away late the following day.
